extendedIngredients.name: vegetable broth
extendedIngredients.original: 3 – 3 ½ cups shrimp, chicken, or vegetable broth
extendedIngredients.originalName: – 3 ½ cups shrimp, chicken, or vegetable broth

extendedIngredients.name: thai fish sauce
extendedIngredients.original: 3 tablespoons EACH roasted Thai chili paste AND fish sauce
extendedIngredients.originalName: EACH roasted Thai chili paste AND fish sauce

title: Creamy Tom Yum Ramen
summary: You can never have too many main course recipes, so give Creamy Tom Yum Ramen a try. This recipe serves 3. For $5.29 per serving, this recipe covers 29% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. Watching your figure? This pescatarian recipe has 428 calories, 33g of protein, and 12g of fat per serving. If you have vegetable broth, shrimp, roasted thai chili paste and fish sauce, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 35 minutes. It is brought to you by Little Spice Jar. It is a pricey recipe for fans of Asian food. Overall, this recipe earns a solid spoonacular score of 62%. Similar recipes include Tom Yum Soup, Tom Yum Goong, and Tom Yum Goong.

winePairing.pairingText: Riesling, Sake, and Sauvignon Blanc are my top picks for Ramen Noodles. Saké is an obvious choice when it comes to Japanese food. If you want to stick to grape wine, though, you might opt for sauvignon blanc or riesling. One wine you could try is Alsace Willm Kirchberg de Barr Riesling. It has 4.8 out of 5 stars and a bottle costs about 24 dollars.

productMatches.title: Alsace Willm Kirchberg de Barr Riesling
productMatches.description: The Grand Cru Kirchberg de Barr is one of the most renowned Grands Crus of Alsace, which gives rise to Riesling of great character. The terroir is deep, giving wines excellent structure, freshness and unparalleled aromatic intensity. Over time, these wines gain particularly in complexity, finesse and minerality.

instructions: Simmer: Add the broth ingredients along with 1/2 cup water to a pot and let simmer over medium-low heat for 10-15 minutes. At this point, you can fish the lime leaves and ginger out or just serve around them later.Finish: Add the mushrooms, Thai chili paste, tomatoes, red bell peppers, and fish sauce. Let it cook for 5 minutes before adding the shrimp. Add the shrimp then slowly pour in the  cup of evaporated milk and let it heat for about 2 minutes. Taste and adjust with more if you want it creamier. The soup shouldnt come to a simmer at all now, you just want everything to heat through without bubbling. Turn the stove off when you see that the shrimp have cooked and the broth is warm. Stir in the cilantro and start with 2 tablespoons of lime juice. Taste and adjust with more as desired!Serve: Add noodles to your bowl and top with prepared tom yum soup. Top with soft boiled eggs, sliced lime wedges, sliced red peppers, more cilantro and anything else you like in your ramen bowl!

analyzedInstructions.name: Add the broth ingredients along with 1/2 cup water to a pot and let simmer over medium-low heat for 10-15 minutes. At this point, you can fish the lime leaves and ginger out or just serve around them later.Finish

steps.step: Add the mushrooms, Thai chili paste, tomatoes, red bell peppers, and fish sauce.
Let it cook for 5 minutes before adding the shrimp.

Add the shrimp then slowly pour in the  cup of evaporated milk and let it heat for about 2 minutes. Taste and adjust with more if you want it creamier. The soup shouldnt come to a simmer at all now, you just want everything to heat through without bubbling. Turn the stove off when you see that the shrimp have cooked and the broth is warm. Stir in the cilantro and start with 2 tablespoons of lime juice. Taste and adjust with more as desired!
Add noodles to your bowl and top with prepared tom yum soup. Top with soft boiled eggs, sliced lime wedges, sliced red peppers, more cilantro and anything else you like in your ramen bowl!
